mapper.select: SELECT in_approval_id, document_id, employee_num, in_approval_request_date, in_approval_status, in_approval_request_content, in_approval_rejected_content, in_approval_file_path, company_num FROM grpwr_in_approval WHERE in_approval_id = #{inApprovalId} and company_num = #{companyNum}

SELECT g.in_approval_id, g.document_id, g.employee_num, h.employee_name, -- 바깥 쿼리에서 employee_name을 가져오기 g.in_approval_request_date, g.in_approval_status, g.in_approval_request_content, g.in_approval_rejected_content, g.in_approval_file_path, g.company_num, s.document_type FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(grpwr_in_approval pk_grpwr_in_approval) */ rownum rn, g.in_approval_id, g.document_id, g.employee_num, g.in_approval_request_date, g.in_approval_status, g.in_approval_request_content, g.in_approval_rejected_content, g.in_approval_file_path, g.company_num FROM grpwr_in_approval g
WHERE rownum <= #{dto.end} and g.in_approval_status = 'WAITING' AND
company_num LIKE '%' || #{companyNum} || '%'
AND g.in_approval_request_date >= TO_DATE(#{dto.inApprovalRequestDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND g.in_approval_request_date <= TO_DATE(#{dto.inApprovalRequestDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
) g JOIN hr_employee h ON g.employee_num = h.employee_num join stdr_document s on g.document_id = s.document_id WHERE rn >= #{dto.start}
AND s.document_type Like '%' || #{dto.documentType} || '%'
AND h.employee_name Like '%' || #{dto.employeeName} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(in_approval_id) FROM grpwr_in_approval
company_num LIKE '%' || #{companyNum} || '%' AND in_approval_status = 'WAITING'
AND in_approval_request_date >= TO_DATE(#{dto.inApprovalRequestDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND in_approval_request_date <= TO_DATE(#{dto.inApprovalRequestDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
